benchmark_details.name: Marking
benchmark_details.overview: Marking is a novel grading task that enhances automated grading systems by analyzing student responses and providing visual highlights of correct, incorrect, and irrelevant segments while detecting omissions from gold answers.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a more detailed and informative assessment method for automated grading beyond traditional binary scoring.

data.source: BioMarking dataset curated by biology Subject Matter Experts
data.annotation: Annotated by Subject Matter Experts based on gold standard answers

methodology.calculation: F1 Score calculated for each category: entailment, contradiction, neutral, and omission using precision and recall.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better model performance in accurately assessing student responses.
methodology.baseline_results: RoBERTa-large achieved an F1 score of 0.762 in the Error-focused setting.
